verses.text: \w And|strong="H4872"\w* Mary \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Ethiopian,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Hath \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w only|strong="H0389"\w*? hath \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w us|strong="H0559"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* manner? \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w*,

(\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* meek \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* dwelt \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*)

\w Immediately|strong="H6597"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Mary: \w Come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H0413"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* only \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* covenant. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H0175"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*,

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H7121"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w entry|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w calling|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Mary. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H0175"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w*,

\w He|strong="H0518"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*: \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w among|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* appear \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w vision|strong="H4759"\w*, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* most \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*:

\w For|strong="H0413"\w* \w I|strong="H5650"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* plainly, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w riddles|strong="H2420"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* figures doth \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H5027"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w then|strong="H1696"\w* \w were|strong="H5650"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* ill \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*?
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* being \w angry|strong="H2734"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* went away:

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w also|strong="H0175"\w* \w that|strong="H2009"\w* \w was|strong="H6051"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w departed|strong="H5493"\w*: \w and|strong="H0175"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* Mary appeared white \w as|strong="H0168"\w* \w snow|strong="H7950"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* leprosy. \w And|strong="H0175"\w* \w when|strong="H6437"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w had|strong="H0175"\w* \w looked|strong="H6437"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0175"\w* \w saw|strong="H2009"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H2009"\w* covered \w with|strong="H0413"\w* leprosy,

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w beseech|strong="H4994"\w* thee, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, \w lay|strong="H7896"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w this|strong="H0834"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w foolishly|strong="H2973"\w* \w committed|strong="H2398"\w*:

\w Let|strong="H4994"\w* \w her|strong="H0398"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w one|strong="H0408"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* abortive \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* cast \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w motherâ€™s|strong="H0517"\w* \w womb|strong="H7358"\w*. Lo, \w now|strong="H4994"\w* \w one|strong="H0408"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H0517"\w* \w her|strong="H0398"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w consumed|strong="H0398"\w* \w with|strong="H1320"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* leprosy.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w O|strong="H4994"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w beseech|strong="H4994"\w* thee \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: If \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* spitten \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, ought \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H3637"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* least? \w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* separated \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* wards \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w called|strong="H0559"\w* \w again|strong="H0310"\w*.

Mary therefore \w was|strong="H3117"\w* \w put|strong="H0622"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w moved|strong="H5265"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* place \w until|strong="H5704"\w* Mary \w was|strong="H3117"\w* called \w again|strong="H0622"\w*.
